Package Model

Class Diagnosis

java.lang.Object
Model.Diagnosis
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Diagnosis extends Object implements Serializable
The Diagnosis class represents a medical diagnosis for a patient. Each diagnosis is uniquely identified and can have multiple treatments associated with it.

This class implements the Serializable interface, allowing it to be serialized for data persistence. It maintains details about the diagnosis, such as its ID, name, description, and a list of treatments.

Since:
2024-11-17
